item.title: 香港采取行动平息大楼火灾后的民愤
item.description: 香港发生了近八十年来最严重的火灾，造成至少 128 人死亡，并引发了对漏报警报的质疑。【原文：Hong Kong’s government moved to stamp out mounting public anger in the wake of the city’s deadliest fire in nearly eight decades, which left at least 128 people dead and raised questions about missed warnings.】

item.title: 印度航空公司完成 A320 软件升级：监管机构
item.description: 印度安全监管机构--民航总局周日表示，印度的航空公司已经完成了空客 320 系列飞机的紧急软件升级。【原文：The Directorate General of Civil Aviation, India’s safety regulator, Sunday said airlines in the country have completed urgent software upgrades of the Airbus 320 family of aircraft.】

item.title: Coupang 面临韩国最大规模数据黑客攻击调查
item.description: 韩国当局正在调查在线零售商 Coupang 公司的数据泄露事件，该事件暴露了约 3370 万个账户，这可能是韩国 5 170 万人口中范围最广的一次黑客攻击。【原文：South Korean authorities are investigating a data leak at online retailer Coupang Inc. that exposed about 33.7 million accounts in what could be the widest hack for the country of 51.7 million people.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动下滑创历史最长纪录
item.description: 随着中国经济放缓的加深，11 月份中国工厂活动有所改善，但仍处于萎缩状态，连降幅度创下新高。【原文：China’s factory activity improved but remained in contraction in November, extending its streak of declines to a record as the country’s economic slowdown deepens.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣称外汇走势并非基于基本面
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山聪树（Satsuki Katayama）表示，"很明显"，日元的剧烈波动并不是 "基于基本面的变动"，这是日本政府对货币感到失望的最新表现。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama said it is “clear” that volatile yen swings aren’t “moving based on fundamentals,” in the latest expression of the government’s frustration over the currency.】

item.title: 华尔街预测印度市场在经历艰难一年后将反弹
item.description: 在经历了几十年来印度市场表现最差的一年之后，华尔街的一些大公司正在呼吁市场反弹。【原文：After one of India’s worst years of market underperformance in decades, some of the biggest names on Wall Street are calling for a rebound.】

item.title: 布雷曼执掌新西兰央行，"天赋 "理想经济
item.description: 瑞典人安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）接替新西兰央行行长一职的时机非常理想。【原文：Sweden’s Anna Breman is taking the helm of New Zealand’s central bank at an ideal time, according to the man she’s replacing.】

item.title: 马里在达成结束矿山纠纷的协议后释放被拘留的巴里克员工
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）在马里的法律代表表示，作为与政府达成的协议的一部分，该公司在马里被拘留一年多的几名员工已于本周获释。【原文：Several Barrick Mining Corp. employees, who had been detained in Mali for more than a year, were released this week as part of a deal with the government, the company’s legal representative in the country said.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率接近 2%，欧洲央行将按兵不动
item.description: 欧元区通胀率可能保持在接近 2% 的水平，这应该足以让官员们相信，他们可以避免在 12 月份调整利率。【原文：A euro-zone inflation reading that’s likely to stay close to 2% should be enough to satisfy officials that they can avoid tweaking interest rates in December.】

item.title: 官方：意大利在蒙特帕斯奇-Mediobanca 交易中遵守规则
item.description: 意大利财政部表示，在 Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 收购竞争对手 Mediobanca 的交易面临检察官调查之际，财政部的行为符合规则和程序。【原文：Italy’s Finance Ministry said it acted in compliance with rules and procedures in Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA’s purchase of rival Mediobanca, as the deal faces a probe by prosecutors.】

item.title: 法国总统马克龙将与泽连斯基就美国和平计划举行会谈
item.description: 法国总统府表示，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统将于周一在巴黎会见乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基，讨论在乌克兰实现 "公平和持久和平 "的条件。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron will meet his counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskiy in Paris on Monday for discussions about the conditions for a “fair and lasting peace” in Ukraine, the French presidency said.】

item.title: 美国企业债务交易商面临更低的奖金：信贷周刊
item.description: 还有几个月就是发奖金的季节了，公司债券交易员是华尔街少数几个预计今年总体薪酬会下降的群体之一。【原文：With bonus season just a few months away, corporate bond traders are one of the few groups on Wall Street expected to see their overall compensation slip for this year.】

item.title: 中国石油天然气集团公司（CPC）报告黑海石油装运在新攻击发生后出现停顿
item.description: 里海管道财团负责处理哈萨克斯坦经由俄罗斯向黑海出口的大部分原油，在乌克兰一夜之间对该地区发动袭击的情况下，该财团的三个停泊点中有一个遭到破坏，因此停止了装货。【原文：The Caspian Pipeline Consortium, which handles most of Kazakhstan’s crude exports through Russia to the Black Sea, halted loading after one of its three moorings was damaged amid Ukraine’s overnight attacks on the region.】

item.title: 中国希望主导高新技术和低技术产业
item.description: 在低技术产品市场方面，北京正在后面拉起阶梯。【原文：Beijing is pulling the ladder up behind it when it comes to the market for low-tech goods.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：英国、日本的预算；谨慎的美国消费者
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在英国预算中做了足够多的工作，帮助她和首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）暂时度过难关，重新建立了重要的财政缓冲区并扩大了福利。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves did enough in the UK budget to help her and Prime Minister Keir Starmer survive for now, building back a vital fiscal buffer and expanding welfare.】

item.title: 日本歌手在上海的演出突然取消
item.description: 由于日本首相高市真奈对台湾的言论所产生的影响继续恶化亚洲两个最大经济体之间的关系，一名日本歌手周五被迫停止了在上海的演出。【原文：A Japanese singer was forced to stop her performance in Shanghai on Friday as the fallout from Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s remarks on Taiwan continues to sour ties between Asia’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 南非的 "万物集会 "取决于经济承诺
item.description: 除非经济增长回升到足以缓解南非居高不下的失业率，否则今年南非资产的炙热涨势有可能耗尽。【原文：The searing rally across South African assets this year risks running out of steam unless economic growth picks up enough to make a dent in the nation’s sky-high unemployment rate.】

item.title: 香港火灾后，中国将检查高层建筑的风险
item.description: 中国应急管理部网站周六发布声明称，本周早些时候香港发生致命火灾后，中国政府将检查高层建筑的火灾风险。【原文：The Chinese government will inspect fire risks in high-rise buildings after the deadly blaze in Hong Kong earlier this week, according to a statement posted Saturday on the Ministry of Emergency Management’s website.】

item.title: 美光将向日本内存芯片工厂投资 96 亿美元：日经新闻
item.description: 据《日经新闻》报道，美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc. will spend 1.5 trillion yen ($9.6 billion) to build a plant in western Japan to make memory chips for artificial intelligence applications, Nikkei newspaper reported.】

item.title: 英国酒店和酒吧再次感受预算之痛，欣慰转为愤怒
item.description: 当蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）告诉议会，她的预算将以 "1991 年以来最低的税率 "帮助陷入困境的酒店业时，英国的酒吧业主和酒店经营者都松了一口气。现在，商业税（一种财产税）的细枝末节出现了，他们大呼不妙。【原文：When Rachel Reeves told Parliament her budget would help struggling hospitality businesses with “the lowest tax rates since 1991,” UK pub owners and hoteliers breathed a sigh of relief. Now that the fine print of changes to business rates — a property tax — has emerged, they’re crying foul.】

item.title: 与国王有关的马来西亚能源枢纽希望获得 350 亿美元投资
item.description: 与马来西亚国王易卜拉欣-依斯干达苏丹（Sultan Ibrahim Iskandar）有关的一个能源项目的开发商表示，从长远来看，该项目可以吸引全球投资者价值 1,440 亿林吉特（350 亿美元）的投资，并有助于支持国家经济。【原文：The developer of an energy project linked to Malaysia’s king, Sultan Ibrahim Iskandar, says it could attract 144 billion ringgit ($35 billion) worth of investment from global investors in the long term and help support the nation’s economy.】

item.title: 迪特瓦气旋造成斯里兰卡 20 年来最严重洪灾，123 人死亡
item.description: 据法新社报道，"迪特瓦 "气旋已在斯里兰卡造成 123 人死亡，另有 130 人失踪，暴雨引发了该国二十多年来最严重的洪灾。【原文：Cyclone Ditwah has killed 123 people across Sri Lanka, with another 130 missing, according to AFP, as torrential rains caused the country’s worst flooding in over two decades.】

item.title: 德国足球明星马里奥-戈策在场外追逐收益
item.description: 德国足球运动员马里奥-戈策（Mario Goetze）今年 33 岁，这通常是球员们开始考虑职业体育生涯之后的生活的时候。然而，戈策已经准备了好几年。在勒布朗-詹姆斯（LeBron James）和凯文-杜兰特（Kevin Durant）等美国顶级运动员的启发下，他建立了一个稳健的私人投资组合，并将在职业生涯结束后继续发展。【原文：German footballer Mario Goetze is 33, which is often when players start thinking about life after professional sports. Goetze, however, has been preparing for some years already. Inspired by top US athletes like LeBron James and Kevin Durant, he’s built a robust private investment portfolio that he’ll keep developing after his first career ends.】

item.title: 英国预算监督机构因失误面临新的改革呼声
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）就任财政大臣后的第一项举措就是赋予英国预算监督机构更大的权力。一年多之后，她所在工党的知名成员却希望削弱这一权力。【原文：One of Rachel Reeves’ first moves on becoming Chancellor of the Exchequer was to give greater power to Britain’s budget watchdog. Little more than a year later, prominent members of her own Labour Party want to curtail it.】

item.title: 法国电力集团希望建造商合作降低法国新反应堆的成本
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）正努力说服法国最大的建筑公司合作建造新的核反应堆，因为这家国有电力公司正试图控制项目成本。【原文：Electricite de France SA is seeking to convince France’s largest construction firms to work together on new nuclear reactors as the state-owned utility tries to contain project costs.】

item.title: 斯塔默准备为拯救英超而战六个月
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）有六个月的时间来向党内证明自己的能力，因为执政党工党内部对他能否扭转公众对其英国政府信心骤降的质疑声此起彼伏。【原文：Keir Starmer has six months to prove his mettle to his party amid swirling doubts within the governing Labour Party that he can reverse plunging public confidence in his UK administration.】

item.title: 最畅销空客飞机遭召回，全球航班陷入混乱
item.description: 由于空中客车公司（Airbus SE）软件出现重大故障，可能导致重要的假日旅游旺季脱轨，世界各地的航空公司取消了数百个航班，并争先恐后地调整航班时刻表。【原文：Airlines across the world canceled hundreds of flights and scrambled to adjust schedules, as a major Airbus SE software glitch threatened to derail a crucial holiday travel season.】

item.title: 新堡垒公司 30 亿美元波多黎各交易获得初步批准
item.description: 波多黎各监管机构暂时批准了与亿万富翁韦斯-伊登斯（Wes Edens）的新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Regulators in Puerto Rico tentatively approved a contentious deal with billionaire Wes Edens’ New Fortress Energy Inc. to supply liquefied natural gas to the US territory.】

item.title: 被大火困住的绝望香港人寻求帮助和答案
item.description: 李称自己很幸运。【原文：Lee calls himself lucky.】

item.title: 巴西法官用脚踝监视器释放马斯特银行的 Vorcaro
item.description: 巴西一名法官已下令释放上周被拘留的倒闭银行 Banco Master SA 的控股股东丹尼尔-沃卡洛（Daniel Vorcaro）。【原文：A Brazilian judge has ordered the release of Daniel Vorcaro, the controlling shareholder of the failed Banco Master SA, who was detained last week.】
